堆.definition: to pile up; to heap up; a mass; pile; heap; stack; large amount

堆案盈几.definition: lit. piles of work and papers (idiom); fig. accumulated backlog of work

堆疊.definition: to pile up; to put layer upon layer; (Tw) (computing) stack

堆砌.definition: lit. to pile up (bricks); to pack; fig. to pad out (writing with fancy phrases); ornate rhetoric

堆積.definition: to pile up; to heap; accumulation

堆積如山.definition: to pile up like a mountain (idiom); a mountain of (paperwork etc); a large number of sth

堆金積玉.definition: lit. pile up gold and jade; very rich
